title: Radha Krishna devotional app (quotes, gallery, prayers, favorites)

requirements.text: Create a cohesive Radha–Krishna devotional visual theme and apply it consistently across the app (colors, typography, spacing, backgrounds, components). Use a warm, traditional palette (e.g., saffron, marigold, deep green, cream) and avoid blue/purple as the primary brand colors.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent color palette, typography scale, and component styling.
Primary UI elements (headers, buttons, cards) match the devotional theme and remain readable and accessible.

requirements.text: Implement core navigation with a responsive layout and the following pages: Home, Quotes, Gallery, Prayers, and My Favorites (visible after sign-in).
acceptanceCriteria: Users can navigate between Home, Quotes, Gallery, and Prayers from a persistent header/menu.
Layout works on mobile and desktop without horizontal overflow.
My Favorites is accessible only when the user is authenticated (Internet Identity).

requirements.text: Add curated Radha–Krishna devotional content in English for offline use: (a) a Quotes page that lists at least 30 short devotional quotes, and (b) a Prayers page with at least 5 prayer/chant entries (title + text).
acceptanceCriteria: Quotes page displays a list of at least 30 English quotes.
Prayers page displays at least 5 entries, each with a title and multi-line text.
Content renders correctly with line breaks and is readable on mobile.

requirements.text: Enable users to favorite/unfavorite quotes and prayers, and view them in a My Favorites page. Persist favorites per authenticated user in the backend.
acceptanceCriteria: Unauthenticated users can browse content but are prompted to sign in when attempting to favorite.
After signing in, favoriting/unfavoriting updates immediately in the UI and persists across reloads.
My Favorites shows the user’s favorited quotes and prayers and allows removing items from favorites.

requirements.text: Backend: Implement a single Motoko actor API to store and retrieve per-user favorites for quotes and prayers (identified by stable IDs). Include methods to get favorites, add favorite, remove favorite, and clear all favorites for the caller.
acceptanceCriteria: Favorites are stored per caller principal and do not leak across users.
API supports add/remove operations for both quote IDs and prayer IDs.
State persists across canister upgrades using stable storage patterns available in Motoko (no external databases).

requirements.text: Frontend: Integrate backend favorites using React Query (queries + mutations) with loading, error, and empty states on relevant screens.
acceptanceCriteria: Favorites data is fetched via React Query and cached appropriately.
Mutations (favorite/unfavorite) show a disabled/loading state and surface errors in a user-friendly way.
Empty states are shown when there are no favorites, and when lists are empty.

requirements.text: Create a Gallery page that displays a grid of devotional images (static assets) with a full-screen/lightbox view when an image is clicked.
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery shows a responsive grid of the provided static images.
Clicking an image opens a larger view with a close action; users can return to the grid.

requirements.text: Add generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (e.g., hero background on Home and items in Gallery).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly from the frontend (not served via backend).
Home includes at least one generated hero/background image.
Gallery includes the generated images as entries.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose them instead.
Do not use any external databases or third-party auth providers; use Internet Identity for authentication.
nonGoals: Audio streaming (bhajans) or integrating external media APIs.
Push notifications, email/SMS messaging, or real-time chat.
Admin CMS or uploading user-generated images.

Warm devotional home hero background illustration with subtle lotus and mandala motifs, no text (rk-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Set of 6 square devotional gallery illustrations featuring Radha-Krishna silhouettes and floral/lotus patterns, cohesive style, no text (rk-gallery-set-1.dim_1024x1024.png)
Set of 6 square devotional gallery illustrations featuring peacock feather motifs and temple arches, cohesive style, no text (rk-gallery-set-2.dim_1024x1024.png)
